job_details.Functieomschrijving:
With a central Data & Analytics team based in Rotterdam, we are looking for a Data Engineer to continue the growth and establishment of Data & Analytics within our business. At the heart of our strategy, we have defined our Data & Analytics journey. Unlocking and exploring data from multiple sources while delivering the right quality of information to our key stakeholders is our key success factor.
       Responsibilities:
       Management and Strategy:
          + Provide contributions to design, deploy, and maintain the business's data platforms while integrating Generative AI solutions.
          + Implement strategies for acquiring data and promoting new insights across the organization.
          + Extend the data pipeline through collection, storage, processing, and transformation of large datasets.
          + Monitor existing metrics, analyze data, and collaborate with other Data and Analytics teams to identify and implement system and process improvements.
          + Team Management: Guide and upskill yourself and junior engineers, fostering Generative AI adoption across teams
       Collaboration and Support:
          + Work closely with the business teams, gathering technical requirements for exceptional data governance.
          + Define the business's data requirements to ensure high-quality data for use across the department and the entire organization.
       Technical Responsibilities:
          + Data Processing Frameworks: Build and maintain optimized high intensity data pipelines that facilitate deeper analysis and reporting.
          + Data Science Collaboration: Collaborate with senior data science leadership and other teams to leverage data using our tools like Denodo, Power BI and Azure Open AI Services.
          + ETL Development: Design and develop ETL (extract-transform-load) processes using technologies such as SQL, Python and Java in listed order of importance.
          + Database Security: Understanding of security tools to protect data.
job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer

With a central Data & Analytics team based in Rotterdam, we are looking for a Data Engineer to continue the growth and establishment of Data & Analytics within our business. At the heart of our strategy, we have defined our Data & Analytics journey. Unlocking and exploring data from multiple sources while delivering the right quality of information to our key stakeholders is our key success factor.
       Responsibilities:
       Management and Strategy:
          + Provide contributions to design, deploy, and maintain the business's data platforms while integrating Generative AI solutions.
          + Implement strategies for acquiring data and promoting new insights across the organization.
          + Extend the data pipeline through collection, storage, processing, and transformation of large datasets.
          + Monitor existing metrics, analyze data, and collaborate with other Data and Analytics teams to identify and implement system and process improvements.
          + Team Management: Guide and upskill yourself and junior engineers, fostering Generative AI adoption across teams
       Collaboration and Support:
          + Work closely with the business teams, gathering technical requirements for exceptional data governance.
          + Define the business's data requirements to ensure high-quality data for use across the department and the entire organization.
       Technical Responsibilities:
          + Data Processing Frameworks: Build and maintain optimized high intensity data pipelines that facilitate deeper analysis and reporting.
          + Data Science Collaboration: Collaborate with senior data science leadership and other teams to leverage data using our tools like Denodo, Power BI and Azure Open AI Services.
          + ETL Development: Design and develop ETL (extract-transform-load) processes using technologies such as SQL, Python and Java in listed order of importance.
          + Database Security: Understanding of security tools to protect data.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional data engineering tasks like ETL, data pipelines, and data governance. While it mentions integrating Generative AI solutions and Azure OpenAI Services, these appear to be secondary to the core data engineering responsibilities, not the primary focus of building and deploying GenAI applications.

phrases: central Data & Analytics team
continue the growth and establishment of Data & Analytics within our business
At the heart of our strategy, we have defined our Data & Analytics journey
Unlocking and exploring data from multiple sources while delivering the right quality of information to our key stakeholders is our key success factor
Implement strategies for acquiring data and promoting new insights across the organization
Monitor existing metrics, analyze data, and collaborate with other Data and Analytics teams to identify and implement system and process improvements
Work closely with the business teams, gathering technical requirements for exceptional data governance
Define the business's data requirements to ensure high-quality data for use across the department and the entire organization
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the role's focus on understanding business needs, aligning data initiatives with strategy, and delivering data-driven insights to stakeholders.

phrases: Extend the data pipeline through collection, storage, processing, and transformation of large datasets
Data Processing Frameworks: Build and maintain optimized high intensity data pipelines that facilitate deeper analysis and reporting
ETL Development: Design and develop ETL (extract-transform-load) processes
collecting, storage, processing, and transformation of large datasets
job_tasks.justification: This category directly addresses the core responsibilities of building and maintaining data pipelines, including collection, storage, processing, transformation, and ETL development.

phrases: integrating Generative AI solutions
leveraging data using our tools like Denodo, Power BI and Azure Open AI Services
fostering Generative AI adoption across teams
job_tasks.justification: While not the primary focus, the mention of integrating Generative AI solutions and leveraging Azure OpenAI Services indicates some involvement in applying AI models, albeit in a supporting role to data engineering.

phrases: design, deploy, and maintain the business's data platforms
ETL Development: Design and develop ETL (extract-transform-load) processes using technologies such as SQL, Python and Java
job_tasks.justification: This task involves the development and maintenance of data platforms and ETL processes, which are software development activities within the data engineering domain.

phrases: deploy, and maintain the business's data platforms
Monitor existing metrics
Database Security: Understanding of security tools to protect data
job_tasks.justification: The responsibilities include deploying and maintaining data platforms, monitoring metrics, and understanding security tools, which are operational aspects related to data infrastructure.

Work closely with the business teams
Data Science Collaboration: Collaborate with senior data science leadership and other teams
Guide and upskill yourself and junior engineers
fostering Generative AI adoption across teams
identify and implement system and process improvements
Build and maintain optimized high intensity data pipelines that facilitate deeper analysis and reporting
